name: The Parallel
description: The Parallel takes some of the greatest ideas from the real world and puts them to work in a magical world, The Parallel Metaverse where everyone can have fun and find happiness. 1. Gaming with Play-to-earn model It's important to clarify that the Parallel is much more than a game. It is a world designed for enjoyment. In its infant stages, there will be several casual gaming mechanics that are very welcoming, very easy, and very rewarding. . 2.
